internal.content: --- title: Prepare description: date: 1 February 2024 --- 1. Download and install [Python3](https://www.python.org/downloads/) 2. Ensure that you have the following Python packages installed: * pandas * requests * bs4 * json * re * dateutil * ibm-watson-machine-learning 3. Create an IBM cloud account and sign up for watsonx. You can sign up for a free trail for watsonx.ai [here](https://www.ibm.com/products/watsonx-ai/info/trial). 4. Select free news sites that you would like to scrape. While subscription-based news services such as Bloomberg are also possible to scrape, the task becomes much more complicated. In this demo, we will scrape from CNN and CNBC.

MdxNode.rawBody: --- title: Prepare description: date: 1 February 2024 --- 1. Download and install [Python3](https://www.python.org/downloads/) 2. Ensure that you have the following Python packages installed: * pandas * requests * bs4 * json * re * dateutil * ibm-watson-machine-learning 3. Create an IBM cloud account and sign up for watsonx. You can sign up for a free trail for watsonx.ai [here](https://www.ibm.com/products/watsonx-ai/info/trial). 4. Select free news sites that you would like to scrape. While subscription-based news services such as Bloomberg are also possible to scrape, the task becomes much more complicated. In this demo, we will scrape from CNN and CNBC.
